introduction_key2: Hum HTML mein sirf content yaani ki jo kuch bhi likhna chahte hai wo likhte hai. Magar iss content ko sundar banane ke liye CSS yaani **Cascading Style Sheets** ka use karte hai.
introduction_key3: CSS aapke HTML ko style karna bhot aasaan kar deti hai. Jaise,
introduction_key4: Maan lo aapko apne page mein chaar **a tags** ka color - green set karna hai. HTML mein aisa karne ke liye aapko her **a tag** mein jaa kar
introduction_key5: likhna hoga. Magar hum CSS ka use kar kar yeh kaam aur bhi asaani se kar sakte hai. Jaise,
introduction_key6: Aur sabhi **a tags** ka color green set ho jayega.
introduction_key7: _Assignment karne se pehle, yeh concepts padho aur samjho:_
